text: Kappalabandham is a village in the Khammam district, in the state of Telangana, India. It is located 3 km from its local Mandal at Kalluru. ==Demographics== Near kallur,Kallur is between Tallada and VM Banjer There are approximately 500 households in the village and surrounding area. ==Economy== The local economy is driven by agriculture, based primarily on cotton, rice, and sugar. ==References== Category:Villages in Khammam district
title: Kappalabandham
